name: Niftysmart
body:
### Welcome to Niftysmart.
Niftysmart is going to be the first smart furniture. It consists of ergonomic furniture that has an interface with your home, such as controlling temperature, light settings, etc.

```
We need app devs!
```



### Make it simple.
We plan to make our products simple to use for our customers.

### Help us.

### Contributors
@aphillipsmusik is the only contributer as of right now.

### Support or Contact
Support us now. We plan to have our project on Kickstarter in a few years, so just contact us at info@imotif8.me.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
